title: Behind the Scenes with 'The Bachelor Live on Stage'
description:
Rachel joined Becca and Ben Higgins on one of the "Bachelor Live on Stage" tour buses a few weeks ago to get an inside look at Ben and Becca's roadie lifestyle. Although the tour is currently postponed, Becca and Ben still wanted to give fans a preview of the tour and share what it’s been like traveling around the country on a tour bus.

Check out www.bachelorliveonstage.com for the latest updates and future show dates.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
